derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (used loosely to denote various medicinal herbs): modern Latin, from Latin alysson, from Greek alusson, from a- 'without' + lussa 'rabies' (referring to early herbalist use)

means.word_mean: 1. any garden plant of the genus Alyssum having clusters of small yellow or white flowers
